A fire broke out after a natural gas leak from an ONGC pipeline in Yanam on August 22, 2025 . The incident involved a pipeline that carries natural gas from an offshore rig in the Bay of Bengal to an onshore plant.

Key details of the corporate development include:

Incident location:The fire occurred on Dariyala Dippa Island-3 in Yanam, Puducherry.

Corporate response:ONGC confirmed the incident and sent a technical team to the site, which successfully plugged the leak.

Operational status:Gas supply from the rig was stopped, and the operations of the facility near the island were halted pending further safety checks.

Casualties:ONGC officials confirmed that there were no casualties.

Follow-up:The local authorities and ONGC are continuing to monitor the situation.
